-- Scryed --

Scryed nods, "Good, Preds and jail are two words that should aways 
go together. I don't think that I could trust a Pred even if they 
tried to prove their good intentions."

"I'm guessing that you haven't checked out much of the ship yet 
either hey, being nearly as new as I am." She says thinking about 
continuing on her explorative journey.
